HEADING: WordPress Connect
HEADING_DOMAIN_QUESTION: Is Your WordPress Site One of These?
OPTION_MANUAL_ENTRY: No, let me enter the url myself.
MESSAGE_SUBMIT: Once you hit submit we'll try to connect to your blog.
MESSAGE_SYNC_DETAIL: If the connection succeeds, we'll begin the comment sync. We'll securely "download" the comments from your blog, and then make sure any new comments are synced across both systems.
